header-text: The free, fun, and effective way to learn a language!
feature-body-1: Learning with Duolingo is fun, and research shows that it works! With quick, bite-sized lessons, youâ€™ll earn points and unlock new levels while gaining real-world communication skills.
feature-body-2: We use a combination of research-backed teaching methods and delightful content to create courses that effectively teach reading, writing, listening, and speaking skills!
feature-body-3: We make it easy to form a habit of language learning with game-like features, fun challenges, and reminders from our friendly mascot, Duo the owl.
feature-body-4: Combining the best of AI and language science, lessons are tailored to help you learn at just the right level and pace.
